content: sure the legs are spread rather far apart to provide stability sew head to body leave enough space for head movement as balancing the huge head on the tiny body will depend on bending the doll a little bit shape upper lip by securing the ends of red yarn then attach lips to head join collar under the body and secure the ends this pattern is a free pattern in the monetary sense of the word i would like to ask you dear crafter to „pay it forward in a way you find appropriate
